parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command

</title><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns the current wind azimuth.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[windDir]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]] - azimuth

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[windDir]] < 45 <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>||</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[windDir]] > 315) [[then]] {
	[[hint]] "I feel a southern wind"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>wind going '''from''' South '''to''' North</value></part></template>
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[wind]], [[setWindDir]], [[setWindStr]], [[setWindForce]]
</value></part></template>

<h3 style='display:none'>Notes</h3>
<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<h3 style='display:none'>Bottom Section</h3></root>
